thread.section_title: Le Relais Madeleine - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The ONLY place to stay in Paris
thread.title_full: The ONLY place to stay in Paris - Review of Le Relais Madeleine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: J B
title: The ONLY place to stay in Paris
text: An absolutely delightful hotel. The location is amazing. You are just steps from Place de la Madeleine, the Opera, Galleries Lafayette, Place Vendome, or Place de la Concorde. The rooms are elegantly furnished and spotlessly clean. The staff is warm and welcoming. Beds are very comfortable. This is a hidden gem in the heart of Paris.
